title: Act fast – this Black Friday Xbox controller charging station deal is 60% off right now
author: tom-power
summary: Save big on this Black Friday Xbox controller charging stand deal
article: The Black Friday 2021 sales have arrived and, with it, comes a host of big discounts on Xbox controller deals. Right now, you can save 60% on this Controller Gear Universal Xbox Pro charging station at the official Microsoft store – a price reduction that makes for a $30 saving (Not in the US? Scroll down for the best prices in your region).

This is a superb Black Friday deal if you're in the market for a new wireless Xbox controller charging stand, and is the lowest price we've seen so far for such an item. There are other Black Friday Xbox controller deals available at the moment, but you'll do well to find a better offer currently.

If you're the proud owner of a Midnight Forces or Night Ops designed Xbox controller, this is definitely the charging station for you. Pairing your gamepad with either charging stand will make you stand out from your fellow gamers, and give you some pleasing consistency across your gaming peripherals.

Even if you don't own either of the aforementioned controllers, though, you can still invest in one of these charging stations. They're compatible with Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Elite, Xbox One, Xbox One X and Xbox One S gamepads. Unfortunately, you can't charge Xbox Elite Series 2 controllers on them, though. So bear this in mind if you're thinking of picking one up in the Black Friday sales.

The charging station can only recharge one Xbox controller at any given time. But, while you game with one peripheral, you can charge the other one up. Once your current gamepad's battery has run out, simply switch them over and continue gaming solo or with your friends.
